response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that I believe holds immense value for you. This product, tailored specifically to meet your needs and expectations, is worth $1,000,000 to you. My proposal is to offer it to you at a special price of $950,000, which I believe is a fair and advantageous deal considering its worth and the benefits it will bring to you.

Please let me know if this offer meets your requirements and budget. I am more than happy to discuss any further details or address any concerns you might have.

Looking forward to your positive response.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
